tool_description: This API predicts the category of a given ticket, for customer support domain.
name: Ticket Classification
title: Ticket Classification

api_list.name: Ticket Classification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ticket-classification.p.rapidapi.com/ticket-classification"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ticket-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ticket-classification.p.rapidapi.com/ticket-classification"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ticket-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
